md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 8 Episode 16 Second Chance
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: Hester Sue's ex-husband, Sam, arrives in Walnut Grove, stating that he is reformed from his days of drinking, gambling and wild living.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: Hester Sue's ex-husband, Sam, arrives in Walnut Grove, stating that he is reformed from his days of drinking, gambling and wild living. Sam appears to be reformed and Hester Sue believes him enough to agree to re-marry him.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: Hester Sue's ex-husband, Sam, arrives in Walnut Grove, stating that he is reformed from his days of drinking, gambling and wild living. Sam appears to be reformed and Hester Sue believes him enough to agree to re-marry him.
